trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> métodos permitem que você adicione e remova os controles individuais da coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> métodos para adicionar ou remover todos os controles da coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> é um membro da coleção, passando o controle para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Contains%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor de índice do local de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> na coleção, passar o controle para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A coleção pode ser copiada em uma matriz chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.CopyTo%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo remove uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> se ele é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles são adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, o botão de opção denominado `radioButton2` é removido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> representing the control that owns the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que representa o controle proprietário da coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to add to the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a adicionar à coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o controle especificado à coleção de controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method allows you to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the end of the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> método permite que você adicione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos ao final da coleção de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can also add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode adicionar novas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos na coleção usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> que você adicionou anteriormente, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> can only be assigned to one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> at a time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> só pode ser atribuída a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> por vez.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is already a child of another control it is removed from that control before it is added to another control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> já é filho de outro controle é removido deste controle antes de ser adicionado a outro controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle é adicionado ao painel de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The specified control is a top-level control, or a circular control reference would result if this control were added to the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O controle especificado é um controle de nível superior ou uma referência de controle circular resultaria caso esse controle fosse adicionado à coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: The object assigned to the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atribuído ao parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> method to ensure that the control is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> método para garantir que o controle é adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a serem adicionados à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of control objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma matriz de objetos de controle à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects contained in the `controls` array are appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos contidos na `controls` matriz são acrescentados ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method to quickly add a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection instead of manually adding each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> to the collection using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> método para adicionar rapidamente um grupo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos na coleção em vez de adicionar manualmente cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> à coleção usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> que você adicionou anteriormente, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles são adicionados para o painel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> method to ensure that the controls are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[])" /> método para garantir que os controles são adicionados à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes all controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os controles da coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> método para remover toda a coleção de controles de um controle pai.

trans-unit.source: To remove an individual control from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um controle individual da coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method does not remove control handles from memory.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> método não remove as alças de controle de memória.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> method to avoid memory leaks.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> perdas de método para evitar a memória.

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir remove todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one other control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e pelo menos um outro controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The other controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Os outros controles são adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, all the controls contained in the panel are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, todos os controles contidos no painel são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear" /> método para garantir que todos os controles são removidos da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified control is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o controle especificado é membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a member of the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> é um membro da coleção; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você determine se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> é um membro da coleção antes de tentar realizar operações de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to confirm that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> has been added to or is still a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para confirmar que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> foi adicionado ao ou ainda é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo remove uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> se ele é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e pelo menos um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles são adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, o botão de opção denominado `removeButton` é removido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> contains an item with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> atual contém um item com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> contains an item with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> contém um item com a chave especificada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search all child controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para pesquisar todos os controles filho; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Searches for controls by their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name" /> property and builds an array of all the controls that match.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa controles por sua propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name" /> e cria uma matriz de todos os controles que correspondam.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> containing the matching controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que contém os controles correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou a cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of a control within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o índice de um controle na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for in the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> pelo qual pesquisar na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the specified child control within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o índice do controle filho especificado na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the location of the specified child control within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a localização do controle filho especificado na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: O controle com um valor de índice de zero é na parte superior da ordem z e números mais altos são mais próximos à parte inferior.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> não está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for in the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> pelo qual pesquisar na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw an exception if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> specified in the <c>child</c> parameter is not a control in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para gerar uma exceção se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> especificado no parâmetro <c>child</c> não for um controle no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the specified child control within the control collection, and optionally raises an exception if the specified control is not within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o índice do controle filho especificado dentro da coleção de controle e, opcionalmente, gera uma exceção se o controle especificado não estiver dentro da coleção de controle.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the location of the specified child control within the control collection; otherwise -1 if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a localização do controle filho especificado na coleção de controles, caso contrário, -1 se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> especificado não for encontrado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: O controle com um valor de índice de zero é na parte superior da ordem z e números mais altos são mais próximos à parte inferior.

trans-unit.source: A return value of -1 is returned only when the `throwException` parameter is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de retorno de -1 é retornado somente quando o `throwException` parâmetro é `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />, and the <paramref name="throwException" /> parameter value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="child" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> não está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> e o valor do parâmetro <paramref name="throwException" /> é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a reference to an enumerator object that is used to iterate over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma referência a um objeto de enumerador que é usado para iterar sobre uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the specified control in the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o índice do controle especificado na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a posição do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> especificado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: If the control is not found in the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> method return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle não for encontrado na coleção, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> método de valor de retorno é -1.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control to search for.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first occurrence of the specified item within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o índice da primeira ocorrência do item especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the control with the specified name in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência do controle com o nome especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> é chamado sucessivamente, a última retornou o índice será verificado para uma correspondência de chave pela primeira vez e se não houver nenhuma correspondência, a pesquisa começa no início da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A chave comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or an item with the specified key is not found, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o `key` parâmetro é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ou um item com a chave não for encontrada, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the control to retrieve from the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do controle a ser recuperado da coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> at the specified indexed location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indica o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> no local indexado especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> located at the specified index location within the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> localizado no local de índice especificado na coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, reference the collection object with a specific index value.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, fazem referência ao objeto de coleção com um valor de índice específico.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> is a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> é um índice com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> value is less than zero or is greater than or equal to the number of controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero ou maior ou igual ao número de controles na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control to retrieve from the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle a ser recuperado da coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: Indicates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> with the specified key in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> com a chave especificada na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> with the specified key within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> com a chave especificada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle proprietário desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que detém este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser removido de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified control from the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o controle especificado da coleção do controle.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> é removido da coleção de controle, todos os controles subsequentes são movidos para cima de uma posição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.RemoveAt%2A> método, ou remova todos os controles usando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if it is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo remove uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> se ele é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle for adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, o botão de opção denominado `radioButton2` é removido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> method to ensure that the control is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> método para garantir que o controle é removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a control from the control collection at the specified indexed location.
trans-unit.target: Remove um controle da coleção de controles no local indexado especificado.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> é removido da coleção de controle, todos os controles subsequentes são movidos para cima de uma posição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> that you previously added by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> que você adicionou anteriormente usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> objetos na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> if the count of the collection is greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir remove a primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> da classe derivada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> se a contagem da coleção é maior que zero.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and at least one other control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que você tenha criado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e pelo menos um outro controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The other controls are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Outros controles são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the first control contained in the panel is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o botão é clicado, o primeiro contido no painel de controle é removido do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the child control to remove.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle filho a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the child control with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Remove o controle filho com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <c>child</c><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <c>child</c><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: The new index value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de índice do controle.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified child control in the collection to the specified index value.
trans-unit.target: Define o índice do controle filho especificado na coleção com o valor de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.SetChildIndex%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> referred to by the `child` parameter is moved to the position specified by `newIndex` and the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> references in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> are reordered to accommodate the move.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.SetChildIndex%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> referenciado pelo `child` parâmetro é movido para a posição especificada pelo `newIndex` e outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> referências no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> são reordenadas para acomodar a mudança.

trans-unit.source: The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: O controle com um valor de índice de zero é na parte superior da ordem z e números mais altos são mais próximos à parte inferior.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="child" /> control is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle <paramref name="child" /> não está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.ICloneable>.
